rows: Timeout in milliseconds for attempting to locate the configuration file if it is removed temporarily. By default, 180000 (3 minutes).
Number of attempts to locate the configuration file if it is removed temporarily. By default, 20.
html:
RetryFileWatchingDelay

Timeout in milliseconds for attempting to locate the configuration file if it is removed temporarily. By default, 180000 (3 minutes).

MaxFileWatchingRetries

Number of attempts to locate the configuration file if it is removed temporarily. By default, 20.
